title: Monopolist limits Q, charge P greater than MC

content.question: A monopolist is inefficient from societyâ€™s point of view because

choices.label: it overproduces output and charges a price above marginal cost
it underproduces output and charges a price above marginal cost
it sometimes colludes with other firms to obtain higher prices
the price the monopolist charges is too low and it does not advertise
consumers must pay whatever price the monopolist charges

content.answer: it underproduces output and charges a price above marginal cost

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
